name: LeadBoxer for Gravity Forms
author: LeadBoxer

sections.description: LeadBoxer is a Lead Generation Platform, enabling marketings teams to identify, qualify and manage their leads. This add-on for Gravity Forms allows you to easily capture form submissions and connect them with the leads in LeadBoxer, where you will see their complete customer or buying journey and enriched profile.
sections.installation:
This plugin is an Add-on to Gravity Forms. Do not use if you do not have Gravity Forms installed.

To install the plugin, either add the plug-in via your WordPress admin plugin section, upload the .zip file using the plugin installer, or SFTP the files over to your wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate it.

Configuration Options
To make the plugin work correctly, you need to enter your LeadBoxer dataset ID. you can set this setting under Gravity Forms Settings -> LeadBoxer
sections.faq:
Do i need an LeadBoxer (trial) account to use this plugin

yes

Do i need to use Gravity Forms for this add-in to work?

Yes, this add-on is specifically created for Gravity forms

Will this track every form on my WordPress website?

You can enable/disable for each form on your site

short_description: This plugin can be used to track Gravity Forms submissions into LeadBoxers Lead Identification and Management Platform
description: LeadBoxer is a Lead Generation Platform, enabling marketings teams to identify, qualify and manage their leads. This add-on for Gravity Forms allows you to easily capture form submissions and connect them with the leads in LeadBoxer, where you will see their complete customer or buying journey and enriched profile.
